actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the distribution within the United States, for public viewing in conjunction with the American Revolution Bicentennial, of certain films prepared by the U.S.  Information Agency.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the United States Information Agency to make available a master copy of four specified films ("Echoes," "Santa Fe," "The Numbers Start With the River," and "The Copland Portrait") prepared by such agency to the Administrator of the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration. Directs the Administrator to provide for the distribution of copies of such films for public viewing in commemoration of the Bicentennial.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the distribution within the United States, for public viewing in conjunction with the American Revolution Bicentennial, of certain films prepared by the U.S.  Information Agency.
